content.query:
let DistinctRegUsers = UserRegistrationDetails_CL
| distinct UserPrincipalName_s, UserDisplayName_s;
let WHFBUsage = SigninLogs
    | where Resource == "Microsoft.aadiam" and AppDisplayName == "Windows Sign In"
    | extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
    | extend succeeded_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
    | where authenticationMethod_ == "Windows Hello for Business" and succeeded_ == "true"
    | extend authenticationStepDateTime_ = todatetime(tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationStepDateTime))
    | extend displayName_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
    | extend trustType_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
    | extend deviceId_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.deviceId);
WHFBUsage
| project UserPrincipalName, Identity, displayName_
| join kind=fullouter (DistinctRegUsers
    | project UserPrincipalName_s, UserDisplayName_s)
    on $left.UserPrincipalName == $right.UserPrincipalName_s
| summarize WHFBRegisteredCount=count() by UserPrincipalName_s, UserPrincipalName
| extend UserPrincipalNameC= iif(isempty(UserPrincipalName), "Not Using WHFB", "Using WHFB")
| project UserPrincipalNameC, UserPrincipalName_s, WHFBRegisteredCount
| render piechart
content.title: Windows Hello for Business Usage - User Count

seriesLabelSettings.label: Users registered but not using WHFB

content.query:
SigninLogs
| where Resource == "Microsoft.aadiam" and AppDisplayName == "Windows Sign In"
| extend authenticationMethod_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationMethod)
| extend succeeded_ = tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].succeeded)
| where authenticationMethod_== "Windows Hello for Business" and succeeded_ == "true"
| extend authenticationStepDateTime_ = todatetime(tostring(parse_json(AuthenticationDetails)[0].authenticationStepDateTime))
| extend DeviceName_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.displayName)
| extend trustType_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.trustType)
| extend deviceId_ = tostring(DeviceDetail.deviceId)
| summarize Count = count() by DeviceName_, Identity, UserPrincipalName, authenticationStepDateTime_
content.title: Windows Hello for Business Usage - Per-Device and Per-User Authentication Counts
